nodes.bodyText:
Does ROW type also need to be handled here?
i guess not, but worth adding a comment why
It needs as @martint pointed me. I'm working on updated PR :)
it can't be static, I'd need to pass supportsParametricDateTime everywhere

we shouldn't need to copy the array data, if it does not contain a timestamp type
you can effect that pretty concisely by making the method return optional
where empty would signal "no change"
this way you would do the decomposition only once
Field names may need to be quoted. Have you checked how they are rendered currently?
Yes. I've copied and refactored code from RowType
